citations.narrative:
Around the new capybara enclosure, there was an abundance of flies. While the animal did not appear to be impacted,
flies can transmit disease and can be irritating to the animals. The licensee must establish and maintain an effective
method of pest control.
Correct by 10 July, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the general manager.
n

narrative:
3.131(d) 
   
Sanitation. 
Around the new capybara enclosure, there was an abundance of flies. While the animal did not appear to be impacted, 
flies can transmit disease and can be irritating to the animals. The licensee must establish and maintain an effective 
method of pest control. 
 
Correct by 10 July, 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the general manager. 
 
 n
